title: （入黎re)英國外相奶共藍6月2號已經覆左國安法！

replies.msg:
https://twitter.com/DominicRaab/status/1277992311633465344?s=20

都話6月2號國會答問好有用㗎啦，Domoininc Raab剪返當日啲Key points出黎，然後加返update，咁就可以回應住先，得咗。

當日响國會咁講：

"The imposition of national security legislation on Hong Kong rather than though Hong Kong's own institutions lies in direct conflict with China's internation obligations under the Sino Joint Declaration."
「唔經香港本地機構，直接執行國安條例，已經等如違反中英聯合聲明。」

今日未睇條文咁樣補充：

"🇬🇧will not turn our backs on the commitments we have made to the people of Hong Kong."

P.S. 會唔會阻住英國外交部收工？

#國會公開記錄係好重要

原文：
https://twitter.com/DominicRaab/status/1277992311633465344?s=20
